positions.title: Software Engineer Intern
positions.description:
Automated Message Blasting with simple NodeJS Application and Plivo API for Sales Team.
Scripted data parsers with Java to read custom file format for shipping logs and website scrapers in
python to gather customer data from websites.

given.text: Akhilesh has worked in Honeywell for a 6 months period as an intern in 2018. He has worked in a program under Honeywell Connected plant. He has surprised all of us with his maturity and thought process. He has done an excellent work on In memory persistent cache handling data/ storage layer, services layer and web UI layer. He was sincere in his learning and deliverables. He is ahead of his group in terms of skills, maturity and attitude. Wish him all the best. See less
